title: Senior Cloud Solutions Architect
description: Lead cloud architecture design and implementation for enterprise clients. Drive cloud migration strategies and mentor junior architects.
requirements: AWS/Azure/GCP certifications (Solutions Architect Professional preferred)
5+ years of cloud architecture experience
Experience with Kubernetes, Docker, and microservices
Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
Strong communication and client-facing skills
responsibilities: Design scalable cloud architectures for enterprise clients
Lead cloud migration and modernization projects
Mentor team members and conduct technical reviews
Collaborate with sales team on technical proposals
Stay current with emerging cloud technologies

title: DevOps Engineer - CI/CD Specialist
description: Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines, automate infrastructure provisioning, and implement monitoring solutions for client projects.
requirements: 3+ years of DevOps/SRE experience
Proficiency with Jenkins, GitLab CI, or similar CI/CD tools
Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, and container orchestration
Knowledge of monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK stack)
Scripting skills in Python, Bash, or PowerShell
responsibilities: Design and implement CI/CD pipelines
Automate infrastructure provisioning and configuration
Implement monitoring and alerting solutions
Optimize application performance and reliability
Collaborate with development teams on deployment strategies

title: Full-Stack Developer (React/Node.js)
description: Develop modern web applications using React, Node.js, and cloud technologies. Work on diverse client projects ranging from startups to enterprise solutions.
requirements: 4+ years of full-stack development experience
Expert knowledge of React, Node.js, and modern JavaScript
Experience with TypeScript and modern development tools
Knowledge of database design (PostgreSQL, MongoDB)
Understanding of cloud platforms and containerization
responsibilities: Develop responsive web applications using React and TypeScript
Build scalable backend APIs with Node.js and Express
Implement database designs and optimize queries
Collaborate with UX/UI designers and product managers
Participate in code reviews and technical planning

title: AI/ML Engineer
description: Develop machine learning solutions, implement AI models, and work on data pipeline automation for enterprise clients.
requirements: 3+ years of ML/AI development experience
Proficiency with Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Scikit-learn
Experience with data processing and ETL pipelines
Knowledge of MLOps practices and model deployment
Understanding of statistical analysis and data visualization
responsibilities: Design and implement machine learning models
Build data processing pipelines and ETL workflows
Deploy and monitor ML models in production
Collaborate with data scientists and software engineers
Research and evaluate new AI/ML technologies

title: Cybersecurity Consultant
description: Provide cybersecurity consulting services, conduct security assessments, and implement security frameworks for enterprise clients.
requirements: 5+ years of cybersecurity experience
Security certifications (CISSP, CISM, or equivalent)
Experience with security frameworks (NIST, ISO 27001)
Knowledge of penetration testing and vulnerability assessment
Strong understanding of compliance requirements
responsibilities: Conduct security assessments and risk analysis
Implement security frameworks and compliance programs
Perform penetration testing and vulnerability assessments
Develop security policies and procedures
Train client teams on security best practices

title: Mobile App Developer (React Native/Flutter)
description: Develop cross-platform mobile applications for various client projects using React Native and Flutter frameworks.
requirements: 3+ years of mobile app development experience
Proficiency with React Native and/or Flutter
Experience with native iOS and Android development
Knowledge of mobile app store deployment processes
Understanding of mobile UI/UX best practices
responsibilities: Develop cross-platform mobile applications
Integrate with RESTful APIs and backend services
Implement responsive and intuitive user interfaces
Optimize app performance and user experience
Collaborate with designers and backend developers
